title: Christmas at Wild Fire Ranch
description: This is a stand alone short story that's part of the Christmas at the ranch series. Grab a cup of coffee and enjoy a short but sweet Christmas love story.  Jacob Steele is an ex rodeo star and a widower. After two years, he's ready to heal from his loss, but the small Texas town won't let him. He decides to uproot his life and buy a ranch in the Arizona Mountains. Maybe there, he start over and find happiness again.  Charlene also known as Charlie, is trying to use her carpentry skills to rebuild not only homes, but her life. When the cowboy comes looking for help with a partially burnt down ranch house, it is just what she needs. However, she's got major trust issues and it's going to take a lot to convince her that she belongs with Jacob and on his ranch for Christmas time.
author: Elle Marlow
